Posts.Title: Just when I think I'm good to go.... Suesinstitches Suesinstitches

Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2014 03:42PM sbetts wrote: you are right cancer does not discriminate. I was 30 at the time of my diagnosis and something inside of me knew I had cancer. I would seek a different dr all together in the interim. Press for more testing. Be rude if need be. It's YOUR life they are playing with. Dont hold anything back when it comes to getting the peace of mind yiu so desperately need.
